Package game.controls

Class CharacterController

java.lang.Object
game.controls.CharacterController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener
public class CharacterController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    CharacterController​(MainCharacter p, Enemy e, Enemy2 e2, Boss b)
    CharacterController class used to assign the controls for the character, for example, movement, jumping and attacking.

  • Constructor Details

    • CharacterController

      public CharacterController​(MainCharacter p, Enemy e, Enemy2 e2, Boss b)
      CharacterController class used to assign the controls for the character, for example, movement, jumping and attacking.
      Parameters:
      p - - parameter which passed through the MainCharacter, accessing CharacterController class to be called in the GameWorld.
      e - - this passes in the Enemy class as it is used to add collision when the player attacks them.
      b - - passes the Boss class for collision.
      e2 - - passes Enemy2 to add collision

  • Method Details

    • setProtagonistImage

      public void setProtagonistImage​(java.lang.String imagePath, boolean isRight)
      A method that sets the main character stationary image and flips it, if not facing right.
      Parameters:
      imagePath - - A String for passing through the stationary image.
      isRight - - validates if the main character is facing right.

    • updateControls

      public void updateControls​(MainCharacter protagonist, Enemy enemy, Enemy2 enemy2, Boss boss)
      A method which updates the controller in different levels.
      Parameters:
      protagonist - - Maincharacter class is passed through.
      enemy - - Enemy class is passed through.
      enemy2 - - Enemy2 class is passed through.
      boss - - Boss class is passed through.
